pain_points_original.title: Need for Transformational AI Capabilities
pain_points_original.description: AGS seeks to leapfrog current generative AI by exploring "agentic AI" for autonomous, multi-step task execution. The goal is a fundamental transformation of legal work, not just incremental efficiency gains.

pain_points_original.title: High-Stakes AI Governance and Security Risk
pain_points_original.description: As the government's legal advisor, AGS faces immense risk. AI tools must meet PROTECTED security standards and be explainable, ethical, and transparent to maintain trust and manage legal accountability.

pain_points_original.title: Lagging Productivity in Legal Workflows
pain_points_original.description: Current legal practice workflows are manual and time-intensive, limiting efficiency for 570+ lawyers. AGS needs to augment core tasks like drafting, discovery, and summarisation to boost productivity.

pain_points_original.title: Risk of Fragmented Technology Ecosystem
pain_points_original.description: New AI tools must deeply integrate with core systems (iManage Cloud, Elite 3E) to avoid creating data silos and disrupting established workflows, ensuring high user adoption and process efficiency.

pain_points_original.title: Inaccessible Institutional Knowledge
pain_points_original.description: AGS struggles to efficiently search and leverage its vast internal knowledge base. They need AI-powered search and analysis to unlock valuable precedents and expertise stored across multiple systems.

merge_decisions.merged: High-Stakes AI Governance and Security Risk

pain_points_final.title: Need for Transformational AI Capabilities
pain_points_final.description: AGS seeks to leapfrog current generative AI by exploring "agentic AI" for autonomous, multi-step task execution. The goal is a fundamental transformation of legal work, not just incremental efficiency gains.
